data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Kolé mavofodaiti ta-wuyei.
Mazɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maayikiʋɛ, nii é Anii-Pɛ-Unda,
É yiimazeɠea ga gá-yooi gi ʋɛ,
GALA ka lɛɛzu seizuʋɛ pilɛ sɔlɔɔ gooi zaama.
À guyei loo GALA dɛbi vai ma, à guyei loo!
Mazɔlɔɔ GALA ka ga eteai ma masagi,
GALA ka masadai ɠɛɛzu ziiti unda,
